members.name: get
members.description: Retrieves a value for a key

params.name: touchIDMessage
params.description: the message to show underneath the TouchID prompt (if any)

members.name: set
members.description: Sets a value for a key

params.name: useTouchID
params.description: whether to store the value with security such that TouchID will be needed to grab it

members.name: getJson
members.description: Gets a JSON value for a key

params.name: touchIDMessage
params.description: the message to show underneath the TouchID prompt (if any)

members.name: setJson
members.description: Sets a JSON value for a key

params.name: useTouchId
params.description: Wether to store the value with security such that TouchID will be needed to grab it

members.name: remove
members.description: Removes a value for a key
